Probation Closes 
                       When the Sealing Is Finished 


     Just before we entered it [the time of trouble], we all received the seal of the living God. Then I saw the four 
                                                                           229
angels cease to hold the four winds. And I saw famine, pestilence and sword, nation rose against nation, and the whole world was in confusion.--7BC 968 (1846).
